Girl (SR).description: Increases P.ATK and M.ATK of surviving allies in the front-row. If there is an ATK debuff effective, effect will be increased according to the reduction.

Girl (L).description: Greatly increases P.ATK and M.ATK of surviving allies in the front-row. If there is an ATK debuff effective, effect will be increased according to the reduction.

Gluttonous Eris (SR).description: Greatly reduces the SP cost of all skills for all allies.

Gluttonous Eris (L).description: Massively reduces the SP cost of all skills for all allies.

Hateful Bird (A).description: Greatly reduces ATK of all enemies in the vanguard, even if they have fainted. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Hateful Golem (A).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Hateful Hound (A).description: Greatly increases ATK of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Hateful Plant (A).description: Greatly reduces DEF of all enemies in the vanguard, even if they have fainted. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Library Wisp (SR).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Library Wisp (L).description: Massively increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.
